name: Right on cue
description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

key_work.title: Music cue sheets
key_work.brief_description: In the silent era, studios began to create cue sheets that charted the major moments of a motion picture, along with what kind of audio accompaniment was recommended to match the action on screen.

constellations_primary.name: Right on cue
constellations_primary.description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

start.title: The Thief of Baghdad
start.creator_credit: Raoul Walsh, Douglas Fairbanks and United Artists Corporation
start.brief_description: Douglas Fairbanks plays the part of the Thief of Bagdad. He tries to win the heart of his true love, the Caliph’s daughter, by competing with various Princes to find rare treasure.

constellations_other.name: Right on cue
constellations_other.description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

end.title: Rayman Legends
end.brief_description: Rayman Legends is a platform video game developed by Ubisoft Montpellier and published by Ubisoft.

constellations_other.name: Right on cue
constellations_other.description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

links.description: Music-based stages in Rayman Legends challenge players to match their characterâ€™s actions to musical cues based on changing rhythms.

constellations_primary.description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

end.title: The Thief of Baghdad
end.creator_credit: Raoul Walsh, Douglas Fairbanks and United Artists Corporation
end.brief_description: Douglas Fairbanks plays the part of the Thief of Bagdad. He tries to win the heart of his true love, the Caliph’s daughter, by competing with various Princes to find rare treasure.

constellations_other.name: Right on cue
constellations_other.description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

links.description: Starring Douglas Fairbanks, this fantasy extravaganza opened in New York with an original score played by a 100-piece orchestra, but the cue sheet score composed by James Bradford offered a more practical musical reference for most cinemas of the time.

start.title: The Thief of Baghdad

end.title: House of Flying Daggers
end.creator_credit: Bin Wang, William Kong, Zhang Yimou, China Film Co-Production Corporation, Edko Films Ltd., Elite Group Enterprises and Zhang Yimou Studio
end.brief_description: In 9th century China, a corrupt government wages war against a rebel army called the Flying Daggers. A romantic warrior breaks a beautiful rebel out of prison to help her rejoin her fellows, but things are not what they seem.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

constellations_other.name: Right on cue
constellations_other.description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

links.description: Music played as a synchronised live accompaniment to silent films had the capacity to fill the theatre space in a way that looks forward to surround sound technologies used to great effect in films like House of Flying Daggers.

start.title: House of Flying Daggers
start.creator_credit: Bin Wang, William Kong, Zhang Yimou, China Film Co-Production Corporation, Edko Films Ltd., Elite Group Enterprises and Zhang Yimou Studio
start.brief_description: In 9th century China, a corrupt government wages war against a rebel army called the Flying Daggers. A romantic warrior breaks a beautiful rebel out of prison to help her rejoin her fellows, but things are not what they seem.

end.title: Kung Fu Panda
end.creator_credit: John Stevenson, Mark Osborne, DreamWorks Animation, Raymond Zibach, Glenn Berger and Jonathan Aibel
end.brief_description: When the Valley of Peace is threatened, lazy Po the panda discovers his destiny as the “chosen one” and trains to become a kung fu hero, but transforming the unsleek slacker into a brave warrior won’t be easy. It’s up to Master Shifu and the Furious Five — Tigress, Crane, Mantis, Viper and Monkey — to give it a try.

constellations_other.name: Right on cue
constellations_other.description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

links.description: The House of Flying Daggers engages with and transforms the soundscape conventionally associated with martial arts films. In Kung Fu Panda, these sound conventions are used to comic effect in the dumpling chopstick fight scene.

start.title: The Soundmaker (2004)
start.material_description:
3-channel film installation
Colour, sound
Loop, 35 min 7 sec
While the action takes place on the central screen, two screens at the sides show the procedure of sound-making.
start.brief_description: The Soundmaker (2004) is the first part of Rosefeldtâ€™s Trilogy of Failure (2004/2005) in which three different settings draw a picture of our vain entanglement with everyday rituals.

constellations_other.name: Right on cue
constellations_other.description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

end.title: Turbulent
end.brief_description: Turbulent is a two-screen film installation by famous Iranian artist Shirin Neshat. It is among her most critically acclaimed works, having won her a Lion dâ€™Or at the Venice Biennale back in 1999.

constellations_other.name: Right on cue
constellations_other.description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

links.description: Shirin Neshatâ€™s Turbulent also links sound and image across separate screens. On one screen, men applaud a male singer; on the other, a woman bides her time before overwhelming the other screen with the defiant power of her voice.

start.title: Untitled Goose Game
start.creator_credit: Jake Strasser, Michael McMaster, Nico Disseldorp, Stuart Gillespie-Cook and House House
start.credit_line:
Gift of House House Pty Ltd.
Acquired via the National videogame collecting partnership between ACMI, the Powerhouse and the National Film and Sound Archive.
start.material_description: Executable videogame files (.exe), associated data and asset files.
start.brief_description: Untitled Goose Game is developed by Australian developer House House. Players take on the role of an annoying goose, waddling around an old English Town to create mischief and chaos. By completing a to-do list, players gradually unlock access to more areas of the town. Untitled Goose Game received widespread acclaim since its launched in late September 2019, with critics praising its gameplay and humour. It was named the D.I.C.E. Game of the Year and received a BAFTA Games Award for Best Family and Social game in 2020. It is available for PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, PC and Mac.

While the action takes place on the central screen, two screens at the sides show the procedure of sound-making.
end.brief_description: The Soundmaker (2004) is the first part of Rosefeldtâ€™s Trilogy of Failure (2004/2005) in which three different settings draw a picture of our vain entanglement with everyday rituals.

constellations_other.name: Right on cue
constellations_other.description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

links.description: The Untitled Goose Game uses simple Foley sounds to highlight the gooseâ€™s unstoppable determination to wreak havoc. Julian Rosefeldtâ€™s The Soundmaker lays bare the process of Foley sound creation as part of a meditation on failure and futility.

start.brief_description: When the Valley of Peace is threatened, lazy Po the panda discovers his destiny as the “chosen one” and trains to become a kung fu hero, but transforming the unsleek slacker into a brave warrior won’t be easy. It’s up to Master Shifu and the Furious Five — Tigress, Crane, Mantis, Viper and Monkey — to give it a try.

Gift of House House Pty Ltd.

end.brief_description: Untitled Goose Game is developed by Australian developer House House. Players take on the role of an annoying goose, waddling around an old English Town to create mischief and chaos. By completing a to-do list, players gradually unlock access to more areas of the town. Untitled Goose Game received widespread acclaim since its launched in late September 2019, with critics praising its gameplay and humour. It was named the D.I.C.E. Game of the Year and received a BAFTA Games Award for Best Family and Social game in 2020. It is available for PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, PC and Mac.

constellations_other.name: Right on cue
constellations_other.description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

links.description: As in the Kung Fu Panda dumpling scene, Untitled Goose Game sounds more serious and intense than it looks. The antics of the mischievous and cartoonish goose are accompanied by incongruously refined piano music from classical composer Debussy.
